Reviews.Title: “Hate It...Dont Ever Stay There”
Reviews.Author: ville34
Reviews.Content: Dont ever stay there....and dont believe the pictures, they look fantastic but in reality is a motel . and the service was TERRIBLE too . I almost cry when I arrive there. Imagine we change reservations the next day...luckily!!!

Reviews.Title: “Why do 5 reivews of 1 star = avg of 2 stars?”
Reviews.Author: JMRF03
Reviews.Content: Last place available for a local meeting. It's basically some dodgy rooms on the top floor of a residential block. Let's start at the beginning. I spent 15 mins walking around to find the front door (a dodgy plaque is all that signifies this place). Then got into tiny shaky lift. Reception is as welcoming as the Bangkok Hilton. When the websites includes "paintings" as an amenity and feature, you know you're in trouble! The room wasn't clean and not welcoming. Dirty bed covers, awful TV reception and not even a glass for some water (no tea or coffee either). Bathroom stank and breakfast was a cold coffee and some pre-packed biscuity thing with peach marmalade. Avoid this place at all costs. Luckily I was only there for one night, I would've slept in the park if I had to stay another night.

Reviews.Title: “The worst experience ever...”
Reviews.Author: amoviaggo
Reviews.Content: Never, ever stay at this place. It was booked for my first three nights in Rome. They were over-booked, but lied and said they had electrical problems. They sent me to a dump across town without a private bath or elevator. They did not pay for the taxi ride. The next night they failed to give me a necessary key, so I was locked out until 1 a.m. No one answers any phone numbers, even emergency ones. I was able to get to my room only when another couple arrived after dinner. They helped me search for the appropriate key. After all this, this horrible B&B gave me only a 10 Euro discount, and were rude at that. It is the worst service I've ever had in my many years of travel.

Reviews.Title: “Steer WELL Clear of this Dump!”
Reviews.Author: bradshaw
Reviews.Content: We recently went to Rome for a wedding and stayed in this doss-house!I nearly cried at the thought of hanging my beautiful dress for the wedding in the shabby old wardrobe! This is definitely NOT a hotel and is basically an apartment "converted" into a "hotel". We had to get drunk every night to go back to this place only to find the "night-porter" asleep in a sleeping bag inside the door!!We did look at the "brochure" that they had on the counter and pointed to the nice room on that asking to be moved to that room!We changed rooms on the second day but it was only marginally better...although compared to the first one it was the Hilton! What's worse is that our travel agent booked this!We had picked a hotel in a brochure that she showed us and then she discovered that it was cheaper to book the same hotel online, so she did...however, it was not the same hotel!! Be careful not to confuse this place with the Hotel Veneto!! All I can say is sleep in a car rather than in this place!

Reviews.Title: “filthy and disgusting”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: four 40 something women travelled to rome to see the sights (we had been before). Arrived at veneto suites at our quad room, which looked lovely on the internet site.The lift had no light in. The suite was absolutely disgusting, it was cold, dirty and smelt of damp.It was raining when we arrived + there was no heaters anywhere.Within minutes of arriving we were pested for all 1,000 euros we owed for the 5 nights.We had no quilts on the beds only thin sheets, the sheets had stains on them.Underneath the beds was thick of dust and rubbish. We were given thin towels, which we had to go + ask for new ones after 2 days. The dirty wet towels from ALL residents were stored in a red linin bag in the corridor which leaked onto the floor.The "breakfast" consited of cold coffee + a pre packaged crossant.We all recieved some kind of insect bites. The bathroom was disgusting with no ventilation + the shower leaked all over the floor.The room and bathroom were never cleaned, so absolutely stunk.Smoking was disallowed,probably because there was no smoke detectors.Also the balcony was unsafe as it moved and the window shutters were "plywood". My advice "give this a miss"

Reviews.Title: “Run away!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is not a real hotel. This a dumpy apartment on the 5th floor of a building that someone turned into a hostile (at best). The pictures posted on expedia and elsewhere on the web are bogus. The guy at the front desk admitted as much and apologized profusely. See the pictures I just posted. That is the real hotel. We were scared to stay here and left an hour after arriving.

HotelInfo.Name: Alpha Via Veneto Suite
HotelInfo.Address: Via Sicilia 153, 00187 Rome, Italy
